title: Full Coverage Auto Insurance
terms_and_conditions: This full coverage auto insurance policy provides comprehensive protection for your vehicle. The policy includes liability coverage, collision coverage, comprehensive coverage, and uninsured motorist protection. Liability coverage protects you if you cause an accident, with minimum limits of $100,000 per person, $300,000 per accident for bodily injury, and $50,000 for property damage. Collision coverage pays for damage to your vehicle from accidents, regardless of fault, with a deductible of $500. Comprehensive coverage protects against theft, vandalism, fire, natural disasters, and animal collisions, also with a $500 deductible. Uninsured motorist coverage protects you if you're hit by a driver without insurance, with limits matching your liability coverage. The policy includes roadside assistance, towing services, and rental car reimbursement up to $30 per day for a maximum of 30 days. Medical payments coverage of $5,000 per person is included. The policy covers all drivers listed on the policy and occasional drivers with permission. Coverage is valid throughout the United States and Canada. Exclusions include racing, commercial use, and driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs. The policy does not cover normal wear and tear, mechanical breakdowns, or damage from intentional acts. Coverage for vehicles over 10 years old may have limited comprehensive benefits. The policy requires annual vehicle inspections for vehicles over 5 years old.
